Title: Mammoth Marrow
Description:
Creating new and unusual brews is one of our many specialties. While we do enjoy experimenting with new and fascinating ingredients, we have a few common ingredients that we keep in stock. 

One of these ingredients is the marrow from mammoth tusks. We have run short on marrow and would appreciate your help in collecting more for our alchemists.
ObjectivesText: Gather 20 Tusk Marrow from the mammoths of the Dragon Isles for Dhurrel of the Maruuk Centaur.
